backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, meetings, messages, documents, and notices with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping meeting history, recent meetings, and member search features to their implementation files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, authentication state, and conditional rendering of all views.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to submit and validate basic profile info before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Header bar with navigation, authentication controls, and admin‑aware menus.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend methods such as profiles, members, meetings, messages, and documents.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines custom color variables and utility classes for the app’s theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user's dashboard with profile info, principal ID, and navigation actions after fetching the user profile.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentVaultPage.tsx: Implements the document vault UI, allowing users to upload, download, and delete documents with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation buttons for sign-in and sign-up.
frontend/src/pages/MeetingHistoryPage.ts: Displays a searchable list of past meetings with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/MeetingsPage.tsx: Shows meetings and allows admins to create new ones, including form handling and access control.
frontend/src/pages/MemberAreaPage.tsx: Displays and allows editing of the logged-in user’s profile with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/pages/MemberSearchPage.tsx: Provides searchable member listings with loading, error, and no-results handling.
frontend/src/pages/MembersPage.tsx: Admin-only page showing member count and a table of all members with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Displays inbox messages and provides a form to send messages with username validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeBoardPage.tsx: Shows all notices, allows admins to create and delete notices, and handles validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/RecentMeetingsPage.ts: Lists the 10 most recent meetings with search filtering and support for loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login with loading and error feedback and a link to the signup page.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Handles user registration with Internet Identity authentication, form validation, and success redirect.
frontend/src/utils/textSearch.ts: Provides helper functions for normalizing text, checking case-insensitive matches, and filtering item arrays by search queries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, layout settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project state, existing features, pending requests, and metadata for meeting-related UI sections.
